title: how to disable zoom in game?
body:
hey i play league wtih one hand so i binded my attack move to mb3. now im always zoomed in in teamfights so i often dont see stuff coming.
how can i turn off the zooming by scrolling mouse?

replies.body: Zooming on the mouse wheel are reserved, so it's not currently possible to disable or modify it.  Attack move is also reserved for left or right click currently, unless manual modifications were made.  Unfortunately, we don't have a method to modify configuration to do that and trying could cause potential issues later.  :(  Sorry friend!
I know a way, but involves editing the input file, is fine if its just for disabling that, right? Or is it banable?
could you tell me how to do it?

(Just to make sure you got the notification)
Did it work? If you don't trust the site (I also never heard before I searched about this), I can give you the steps as they are simple and don't take long. 
Is also quite late here so I might not respond until I wake up if is after an hour or so.

Our bans are aimed towards programs or modifications that create an unfair advantage.  We don't support making modifications of game files, meaning we couldn't help you out should something go wrong other than recommending repair steps.  Check out our[ third party guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848) as well for more info!
Well is not an unfair advantage and people have done it before with an older way that doesn't work anymore with the new client, sooo, I'm gonna take it as it is not bannable unless stated otherwise.

Hi, here with the answer, I've also needed that for the exact same reason, I found this article on a site https://www.gameskinny.com/3ge84/how-to-disable-zooming-inout-in-league-of-legends, the only problem I've encountered is that you can't scroll in shop anymore and as stated on the site, make sure you are zoomed out before you make the changes. I've done this 2 weeks ago, so it should work just fine.
